div.span: School Closed
West Geauga Local Schools Will Be Closed For The Remainder Of The 2019-2020 School Year.
Updates
Parents: Dr. Markwardt will continue to send weekly email updates about COVID-19 and other district-related information throughout the period of time that school is closed.

img.title: Girls Bball at GW
img.alt: Girls Basketball Players at Geauga West

div.span: Girls Basketball Players at Geauga West
Several players on the West Geauga Varsity Girls Basketball Team visited Geauga West Library to read books about basketball to a group of students.
Genetics in Honors Biology
Students in Mrs. Ledman’s Honors Biology Classes are learning about DNA and how it is used in the real world. Students collected samples from poodles that visited their classrooms. A ...
WGMB is Going to London
The West Geauga Marching Band has been invited to perform in the 2022 London New Year’s Day Parade. At an all-school assembly on February 12, 2020, Jonathan Whaley, Director of International ...

img.title: Spelling Bee
img.alt: Pacifico Wins Geauga County Spelling Bee

div.span: Pacifico Wins Geauga County Spelling Bee
Congratulations to Parker Pacifico for winning the Geauga County Spelling Bee on February 6, 2020. He will compete at the Tri-County Spelling Bee on March 10th. Good Luck, Parker!
